TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SqlMethods extends System.Object
public ref class SqlMethods abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供与 SQL Server 函数对应的方法。

span.span: Provides methods that correspond to SQL Server functions.

summary.span: 类中的方法仅在 LINQ to SQL 查询中受支持。

span.span: Methods in the class are only supported in LINQ to SQL queries.

summary.span: 对两个指定日期之间的日期边界进行计数。

span.span: Counts the number of day boundaries between two specified dates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对应于 SQL Server 函数，该 `DATEDIFF` 函数使用 `day` 指定跨越的时间边界类型。Corresponds to the SQL Server `DATEDIFF` function using `day` to specify the type of time boundary crossed. 有关此 SQL Server 函数的详细信息，请参阅 [DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql)。For more about this SQL Server function, see [DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql).

Public Shared Function DateDiffDay (startDate As DateTime, endDate As DateTime) As Integer
public: static int DateDiffDay(DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate);
static member DateDiffDay : DateTime * DateTime -> int

span.span: The start date for the time period.
The end date for the time period.

summary.span: 对两个不可以为 null 的日期之间的日期边界进行计数。

span.span: Counts the number of day boundaries between two non-nullable dates.

span.span: The number of day boundaries between the two specified dates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对应于 SQL Server 函数，该 `DATEDIFF` 函数使用 `second` 指定跨越的时间边界类型。Corresponds to the SQL Server `DATEDIFF` function using `second` to specify the type of time boundary crossed. 有关此 SQL Server 函数的详细信息，请参阅 [DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql)。For more about this SQL Server function, see [DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql).

summary.span: 确定特定字符串是否与指定模式相匹配。

span.span: Determines whether a specific character string matches a specified pattern.

summary.span: 目前只有 LINQ to SQL 查询支持此方法。

span.span: This method is currently only supported in LINQ to SQL queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL Server `LIKE` 功能不能通过 (CLR) 和 .NET Framework 构造的现有公共语言运行时的翻译公开，在 LINQ to SQL 上下文外部不受支持。The SQL Server `LIKE` functionality cannot be exposed through translation of existing common language runtime (CLR) and .NET Framework constructs, and is unsupported outside of a LINQ to SQL context. 在 LINQ to SQL 之外使用此方法将始终引发类型为的异常 。The use of this method outside of LINQ to SQL will always throw an exception of type .
